title: STK offers $30 lunch prix-fixe menu during Restaurant Week
statement: STK offers a $30 lunch prix-fixe menu featuring Tuna Tartare Tacos and Steakhouse Skirt Steak during Restaurant Week.

citations.quote: enjoy our exclusive prix-fixe menus, including a $30 Lunch featuring Tuna Tartare Tacos and Steakhouse Skirt Steak
